    #include <cstdio>
    #include<iostream>
    using namespace std;
    
    long reverse(long n)
    {
         
         int a;
         long ans = 0;
         while(n!=0)
         {
                    a=n%10;
                    n=n/10;
                    ans+=a;
                    ans*=10;
         }
          return ans/10;
    }
     
    int ispalindrome(long n)
    {
     if(n==reverse(n))
     return 1;
     else
     return 0;
    }
    
    
    
    int main()
{
     int i,t;
     long n;
     scanf("%d",&t);
     for(i=0;i<t;i++)
     {
                     scanf("%ld",&n);
                     n++;
                     while(!ispalindrome(n))
                     {
                     n++;
                     }
                     printf("%ld\n",n);
     }
     
     
    return 0;
}
